|rad1chip3 = |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "LPC0029 REV:1.6" appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. Default settings are per the FCC manual. Possible 00:1A:EF ('''Loopcomm''') OUI (MAC label on FCC EUT board) ==Links of Interest== [http://fs.airlive.com/manual/AirLive_AirMax5N_Manual_v2.pdf Manual]
[http://www.airlive.com/demo/AirMax5N/ Interface simulator] [[Category:English Documentation]]
